name: Aviator: Air Combat
description:
Don't let the enemy bomber destroy the city. Do whatever it takes to stop it!

You are an ordinary farmer who enjoys a peaceful life not far from civilization. One morning you see a plane moving over you, heading towards the town. And all's well and good, but it's military and... enemy...
It's time to roll your old single-engine plane out of the barn and remember everything you learned in flight school...

All you have to look forward to:
2 maps...
2 bombers
Several different types of shells
Opportunity to attack the enemy
Dozens of difficulty levels

And it will all be accompanied by an awesome soundtrack!
